wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.WK.ZS.def: Children in employment refer to children involved in economic activity for at least one hour in the reference week of the survey. Work only refers to children involved in economic activity and not attending school.
wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.WK.ZS.name: Children in employment
wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.WK.ZS.source: Understanding Children's Work project based on data from ILO, UNICEF and the World Bank.
wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.WK.ZS.dataset: Understanding Children's Work project based on data from ILO, UNICEF and the World Bank.
